---
title: District Domain
description: District Domain Documentation
---

The LEAs are required to submit the following templates and Excel Tools in the District Domain:

## Templates

**[District Fact Template for Safe Schools](docs/templates/district/district-fact-safe-schools.mdx)**

This template applies to the following organizational types:

- School Districts
- Intermediate Units
- Career and Technical Centers
- Charter Schools

**[District Fact Template for Title III Professional Development Activities Survey](docs/templates/district/district-fact-english-leaners.mdx#title-iii-professional-development-activities-survey)**

This template applies to the following Title III subgrantees in these organizational types:

- School Districts
- Intermediate Units
- Comprehensive Career and Technical Centers
- Charter Schools

**[District Fact Template for LIEP Survey](docs/templates/district/district-fact-english-leaners.mdx#liep-language-instruction-education-program-survey)**

This template applies to the following organizational types:

- School Districts
- Comprehensive Career and Technical Centers
- Charter Schools

**[District Fact Template for EL Nonpublic Student Counts](docs/templates/district/district-fact-english-leaners.mdx#title-iii-nonpublic-student-counts)**

This template applies to the following organizational types:

- School Districts

**[District Fact Template for Title I](docs/templates/district/district-fact-title-i.mdx)**

This template applies to the following organizational types:

- School Districts that serve Title I students
- Charter Schools that serve Title I students
- Intermediate Units that serve Title I students: If an intermediate unit is the lead LEA in a consortium of LEAs serving Title I students, it is responsible for reporting the aggregate participation data for all of their member LEAs. Intermediate Units should not report Neglected or Delinquent program data here. That information is reported on a separate system.

**[District Snapshot Template](docs/templates/district/district-snapshot.mdx)**

The District Snapshot Template is used to collect fields related to the kindergarten entry age.

This template applies to the following organizational types:

- School Districts
- Charter Schools (applicable only to charter schools with kindergarten programs)

**[District Fact for Quarterly Vacancy Updates](docs/templates/district/district-fact-quarterly-vacancy-updates.mdx)**

This template applies to the following organizational types:

- School Districts
- Intermediate Units
- Career and Technical Centers (CTC)
- Charter Schools
- State Juvenile Correctional Institutions (SJCI)

**[District Fact for ACT35](docs/templates/district/district-fact-act-35.mdx)**

This template applies to the following organizational types:

- School Districts
- Intermediate Units
- Career and Technical Centers (CTC)
- Charter Schools
- State Juvenile Correctional Institutions (SJCI)

## Excel Tools

**[District Fact Template for Home Education and Private Tutoring Data](docs/templates/district/distract-fact-home-ed-private-tutoring.mdx)**

This template applies to all School Districts.

**[District Fact Template for Support Personnel Data](docs/templates/district/district-fact-support-personnel.mdx)**

This template applies to the following organizational types:

- School Districts
- Intermediate Units
- Career and Technical Centers
- Charter Schools
- State Juvenile Correctional Institutions

:::note
All fields may not be mandatory; however, all fields within each template **MUST BE** accounted for in order to transmit data.
:::
